ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It's a great class. Although I think there could be more hands on learning, the assignment to solve a crystal structure was hands on and allowed me to get some great insights into how crystal structures are solved and what things to be careful about when viewing a solved crystal structure.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It helped me better understand the methods used in biophysical chemistry, their advantages and disadvantages and the math they are based on.
It provided me with a framework for understanding various methods for structure determination. It also gave me some hands on experience for xray crystallography.
Coming to Yale I was very interested in protein crystallography so this course was a great introduction. I only wished I could spend more time in this class to learn more.
